Name: de Ruyschkamer
Review Text: Super gezellig spot with a cozy lounge feel ü•∞ great alternative to typical cafe vibes üçπ excellent for small/big groups. Extensive drinks menu and lekker snacks ü•≥

Name: de Ruyschkamer
Review Text: Love this bar! Great selection of soft drinks, beers and cocktails at a really reasonable price! It's a little bit hidden from sight outside but that's great as its never too busy that you can't get a seat. Despite the small space they've ‚Ä¶

Name: de Ruyschkamer
Review Text: Great bar! Nice staff. Good drinks! Open till late and always able to get a seat and relax.

Name: de Ruyschkamer
Review Text: Feels like grandma‚Äôs living room in a very good way :) good selection of beer and cocktails with pizza right next door which you can enjoy at the bar!

Name: de Ruyschkamer
Review Text: Very friendly staff, amazing non alcoholic drinks selections.

Name: de Ruyschkamer
Review Text: Great cozy atmosphere, nice food and awesome service by the owner.

Name: de Ruyschkamer
Review Text: Ended up in this bar pretty much by accident but loved it so much! They have a huge selection of beers, the menu is written in an original way, the atmosphere is super chill and comfortable, the staff is friendly. Honestly, I have nothing bad to say!

Name: de Ruyschkamer
Review Text: This is one of the best places I visited in Amsterdam. Such a nice (hidden) bar with a large selection of (local) beers. The friendly owners are there to help you choose, or you can grab one your own. We loved the traditional cheese fondue ‚Ä¶

Name: de Ruyschkamer
Review Text: Cozy living room slash vintage lounge setting. Personal bartender and waitresses. Especially the wide variety of less well known (some local) drinks is very nice if you like to try something new.

Name: de Ruyschkamer
Review Text: Nice, cozy place. They don't have beers on tap, but a great selection of bottled beers displayed in fridges near the entrance. Great place to chill on a comfortable couch/chair.

Name: de Ruyschkamer
Review Text: As a place to have a drink, 4/5 stars. But I went there with my friends to get some dinner, having made a booking beforehand, and it took longer than one hour and a half to get our food (which was not that special, 5 pizzas and a shared ‚Ä¶

Name: de Ruyschkamer
Review Text: Super cool atmosphere, ended up here randomly while just strolling by and loved the place. Amazing choice of beers üòä

Name: de Ruyschkamer
Review Text:
Nice cosy place..with lots of beers to choose from and also cocktails and wines...great food from Italian next door.
Also try their own ruyschkamer beer..niceee

Name: de Ruyschkamer
Review Text: Liked it for it's beer selection. A bit dark and cramped in the back but that can be cosy for smaller groups. Larger groups may have trouble finding a comfortable spot. Staff is very friendly.

Name: de Ruyschkamer
Review Text: We arrived hangry, and the staff were just so friendly and accommodating. Gave us some salty nuts to quell the hangry demons rearing their heads. I am so impatient in my hangriness, and it didn‚Äôt break them. ‚Ä¶

Name: de Ruyschkamer
Review Text: Great atmosphere and amazing selection of beers! The staff are super friendly and helpful.

Name: de Ruyschkamer
Review Text: Basically like hanging out in your living room drinking with friends, great place for a fun night of drinking or a quiet afternoon reading with a beer. Gets VERY busy on Friday and Saturday nights, so beware!

Name: de Ruyschkamer
Review Text: My neighbours from across the street! I always go here for coffee and macarons in the morning, spicy tuna sandwich for lunch or Ruyschballen for 4pm drinks time. ‚Ä¶

Name: de Ruyschkamer
Review Text:
Great place.
Nice atmosphere, super friendly staff and great beers! What more do you need?

Name: de Ruyschkamer
Review Text: Lovely chill place, Ruyschkamer is a fun combination of Ruyschstraat, the street where it's located, and huiskamer (Dutch word for living room, aka the place where homely "gezelligheid" takes place, this is exactly what Ruyschkamer stands ‚Ä¶

Name: de Ruyschkamer
Review Text: Very comfortable seats. Nice collection of beers. Excellent location for private parties.

Name: de Ruyschkamer
Review Text: Very nice place to hang with a group of friends! Great beers and very chilled atmosphere.

Name: de Ruyschkamer
Review Text: Beautiful fresh bread with hummus platter, lovely craft beers and cocktails. Relaxed vibe in an indie setting.

Name: de Ruyschkamer
Review Text: Best cafe ever, I'm from Germany and haven't seen something like this ever-). Really liked the owner, Sunny. Felt like I was in his private zone

Name: de Ruyschkamer
Review Text: Very good service, large choice of beers, nicely furnished, good people, great atmosphere.

Name: de Ruyschkamer
Review Text: It's very cosy, with a great selection of drinks. It's a really nice place to go with a group of people.

Name: de Ruyschkamer
